table.name: quickbooks_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quickbooks_fields ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qb_field_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `vtiger_field` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `flag` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
